title: Tatsu
desc:
Post 89
- Ping target with a Tatsu level up message.
- One of their non-<:charge:1240849067362488403> charges (<:ghost_charge:1240975548331720734>, <:corrupted_charge:1240975576324509787>, etc) gets turned into a <:charge:1240849067362488403> at random, if they have any.
- They lose that <:charge:1240849067362488403> if this would cause them to go over their maximum <:charge:1240849067362488403> limit.
